channel.title: Requesting written guide or a movie on client programming
channel.description:
Hello!
I'm not 100% sure if this is the right section for this topic, however I need help with development of a Runescape 2 client.
I find the program code for a 317 client where names as "anIntxx" or "aBooleanxx" are used, cryptic, obfuscated and hard to understand. Therefor, I wonder if somebody knows a well-written guide or a movie where the code for such a client is reviewed. Alternatively, if you got other tips for me and can point me in the right direction?
I have searched for guides on how to read obfuscated Java code, how to program RSPS Clients and ofcourse, general Java programming.
If I explained my problem in a confusing way, feel free to ask.
Have a nice day. :cool:
